objects.text:
• Premium Quality Formula
• Eco-Friendly & Non-Toxic
• Big, Bright, Colorful Bubbles
• Hours of Bubble Fun

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant and playful banner is divided into four colorful quadrants using a background SVG: purple (top left), periwinkle (top right), lime green (bottom left), and minty aqua (bottom right), all sprinkled with semi-transparent white bubbles adding a lighthearted, whimsical effect. A large product image is placed prominently on the right side overlapping the top-right and bottom-right panels. The top-left features a bold white main title ("heading") followed by a bright yellow subheading ("subheading"), and a white tagline just beneath ("tagline"). The bottom-left corner presents a bulleted list of four product benefits in white ("description"), the price in bold ("price"), and a call-to-action button styled with a yellow rounded rectangle ("cta_background") with purple-blue text ("cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Purple: `#9932CC`
- Periwinkle: `#7B68EE`
- Lime Green: `#32CD32`
- Mint Aqua: `#00FA9A`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Yellow: `#FFFF00`
product_color: The product image for "Gazillion Bubbles" showcases a vibrant and playful color palette that appeals to children and fun-loving consumers. Dominant colors include a translucent neon green liquid (#92F869), bright yellow for the word "BUBBLES" (#FCD200), and a rich purple label background (#893DB9). The brand name "Gazillion" is highlighted using lime green (#C3F531) bordered by a mix of dark blue (#30296B) and orange outline (#F29830), making it pop against the complementary background. The label also includes soft blue (#B3DDF4) and bubble accents with pink-purple hues (#D6BBF5). These vivid, contrasting colors are harmoniously blended, yet keep each element visually distinct.
